1.text: Choose a large flower for the middle of your boutonniere.

2.text: Remove any deformed petals around the outside of the flower.

3.text: Snip the stem 1 inch (2.5 cm) below the bud.

4.text: Stick an 8 in (20 cm) piece of floral wire through the base of the flower.

5.text: Fold the wire in half to create a fake stem.

6.text: Wrap the wire tightly in floral tape.

7.text: Group leafy filler plants around the base of the flower and tape them in place.

8.text: Tie ribbons around the stem to add more color to your boutonniere.

9.text: Trim the wire down to 2–3 in (5.1–7.6 cm).
